scripts.start: node -e "try { require('./dist/index.js') } catch(e) { console.error('Error loading dist/index.js, using fallback:', e); require('./fallback-server.js') }"
scripts.start:debug: ls -la && ls -la dist || echo 'dist not found' && node server.js
scripts.build: node build-debug.js && mkdir -p dist && echo 'Building TypeScript files...' && tsc -p tsconfig.json && echo 'TypeScript build completed' && ls -la dist && echo 'dist directory contents:' && ls -la dist || echo 'dist directory missing or empty'
scripts.postinstall: ls -la && echo 'Checking for schema.prisma' && if [ -f ./prisma/schema.prisma ]; then echo 'Found schema.prisma, generating client'; npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma; else echo 'ERROR: schema.prisma not found'; pwd; ls -la; ls -la ./prisma || echo 'prisma dir not found'; fi
